title: The Zoo
brief_description: A visit to one of the world’s largest and most modern zoos, the Chicago Zoological Park. Animals are observed in areas simulating their natural habitat. Features polar and kodiak bears, lions, tigers, kanagaroos, baboons and a variety of familiar and not so familiar animals.
